name: StratoStack
description: Build your own Ethereum rollup in one click. Web-based rollup deployer for Ethereum and beyond. Modular, verifiable, and production-grade from genesis. Build sovereign L2s with real governance. StratoStack makes launching your own Layer 2 chain as easy as spinning up a server. No complicated setup, no scripts—just click, configure, and go. Whether you want EVM or WASM, Celestia or EigenDA, zk or optimistic, it’s all up to you. Full flexibility, zero friction.
